v3.0.2 - Changelog
New --- - Bot will now activate Full Auto/Semi Auto if they are available at the end of the script instead of repeatedly tapping the Attack button until battle end.
Changed --- - Generalized Event image asset and selection. - Various delay adjustments. - Added 1s delay before starting process to select group and party to potentially prevent bot going too fast and selecting the wrong setup.
Fixed --- - Added missing image assets for ROTB Raid farming. - Added missing image assets for Raid farming. - Fixed typos in some image assets.
